description: Let dsf(n) = n_1^{n_1}+n_2^{n_2}+n_3^{n_3} + n_m^{n_m}, where {n_1,n_2,n_3,...n_m} is the list of the digits of an integer n. dsf(1583236420) =1682731 and dsf(1682731) = 18470991,...,dsf(388290999) = 1583236420,.. in this way this 97 numbers make a loop for the function dsf. In fact this is the longest loop for dsf function in the set of all nonnegative integers.
